LanguageData.MustPlaceOnTiberiumGeyser: This must be placed on a Tiberium geyser.
LanguageData.CannotReachTiberium: Tiberium addicted pawn cannot reach Tiberium!
LanguageData.VeinHubSpawned: A veinhub has been spawned by a Veinhole!
LanguageData.MessagePawnEaten: A pawn has been eaten by a Veinhole, should've been more careful!
LanguageData.UseProducerCapDesc: Limit the amount of Tiberium Producers that can spawn by event.
LanguageData.TiberiumProducersAmtDesc: Set the amount of Tiberium Producers that can spawn.
LanguageData.UseSpreadRadiusDesc: This makes Tiberium only spread in a certain radius around producers.
LanguageData.UseCustomBackgroundDesc: Displays the custom TiberiumRim background instead of the the vanilla one.
LanguageData.PawnDamageDesc: All pawns next to Tiberium will get affected by it.
LanguageData.UseSpecifcProducersDesc: Select the specific producers you want to spawn via event.
LanguageData.BuildingDamageDesc: Activate this to let Tiberium damage any structure.
LanguageData.EntityDamageDesc: Activate this to let Tiberium damage any item or object.
LanguageData.PawnConverted: {0} has been turned into a Visceroid!
LanguageData.SelectRefineryDesc: Select a new main refinery for this harvester.
LanguageData.SelectRefinerySame: This cannot be set as the new main refinery as it is the main refinery.
LanguageData.SelectRefineryWrong: This cannot be set as a new main refinery.
LanguageData.SetTiberiumDesc: Set a preferred Tiberium type, it will then be seeked out no matter the distance instead of the other types as long as it exists.
LanguageData.HarvesterModeDesc: Determine whether the Harvester goes to the closest or the most valuable Tiberium on the map. Is overriden by preferred types.
LanguageData.TiberiumHomeAlertExp: Tiberium has spread to your home area, it might cause damage soon!
